name: Mediterranean Dreams

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is the place to stay in Panama if you have are passing through in travels. Staff is more than excellent when it comes to making sure their clients are happy...and with all belongings. Went out of their way to recover my purse...left in a taxi. And they indeed recovered it!! Thanks a million!! Cozy place. Clean and close to good restaurants.
reviews.title: Very Helpful Staff

reviews.text: We had a long stopover in Panama before flying back to Europe and found this hotel via TripAdvisor. I actually wanted to give it a rating between 'Average' and 'Very Good' - which would be just 'Good'.
reviews.title: Very quaint and cosy with a friendly staff.

reviews.text: It's in a residential area and they are now putting up a bigger sign, which explains the paranoia of one of this hotel's reviewers who decided that 'it doesn't even exist'. (Our taxi driver got lost too, but we put him on the phone with the B&B receptionist who was very helpful .)
reviews.title: Nice and quaint. Staff very friendly and helpful.

reviews.text: This is more like a Bed& Breakfast, but it's a lovely colorful, and cosy one. Mind you, we just needed it to have a place to nap and shower after traipsing around Panama City, but the time we spent there was pleasant, and we'll go back.
reviews.title: My place to stay now.

reviews.text: We stayed a full week at Mediterranean Dreams and based it on the previous reviews. We were not disappointed. The one downside of Panama City is price gouging by taxi drivers...you can save a lot with Alejandro's help. He even sent a cab to "rescue" us when we ended up far from town (take his phone number with you when you travel). We easily would have paid double the fare if anyone else had taken us back. This is a perfect place for travelers who want to get out and do things. You will get up to a hot breakfast, coffee and juice and get some tips for your excursion out.
reviews.title: You can't beat the location or service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: While nothing is for sale within the hotel, it is a very short walk to a nice modern supermarket where you can get anything you need, from snacks to liquor. The nice thing being a street back from the main thoroughfare is you will not hear traffic or noise at all. The only thing you hear in the morning during breakfast are birds chirping.
reviews.title: Stay here. Do it. Now.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Restaurants are everywhere (but shame on any American going to McDonald's or Taco Bell). ATM's, casinos and anything else you may need are very close, less than a three minute walk. The neighborhood is safe. When traveling back, jot down the location...the street and address itself may not be known to cab drivers. The area, El Dorado, and the nearest restaurant, Don Lee were enough to tell them how to get us there. Three of us travelled, and we enjoyed it immensly.
reviews.title: Home away from Home

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: American travelers: if you haven't seen "Karate Kid" where the mother thinks there is no hot water in her apartment, you may have the same problem. The hot water control is on the shower head, not the knob.
reviews.title: Wonderful experience

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Great place to stay for a few nights. Very nice guy who owns it. Got some good tips for my stay. Only stayed for one night. Good standard, but its not a hotel though, shared bathroom, but clean and cheap:)
reviews.title: Cool place

reviews.text: My best friend and I actually had a hard time getting there to the hotel, but the staff Alejandro, wife and relatives were amazing. it made are stay increadible. We were only planning to stay for two night but Alejandro suggested to visit "La Isla De San Blas" so we did, and had an amazing experience. Thank you Alejandro and wife for the increadible welcome!! Saludes desde California las dos Mexicanas: Elsa y Ana!!! lol
reviews.title: Amazing!

reviews.text: Much like the other reviews for this little B&B its appeal is in the fact that the owners make you feel so welcome and help is available whatever time of day or night. Alejandro has plenty of advice about Panama City which helped us to familiarise ourselves during our stay. Its that type of service that you just don't get at the larger hotels and why I would definitely recommend staying at this place when you are in Panama.
reviews.title: A home from home in Panama

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The B&B was very clean and the grape room that we stayed in had much needed aircon and had its own patio area where we had breakfast. The location of the B&B is fantastic and there was a couple of great restaurants that were local and which Alejandro recommended.
reviews.title: Best Decision

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: All in all a really great place made even better by the warmth of the welcome provided by the owners.
reviews.title: What a GREAT casa!

reviews.text: We have stayed in Mediterranean Dreams for only one night, but we have enjoyed every second of our stay, naijlt through its fabulous owners. Always there to help you, answer your questions, walk the extra mile. For us, the location was perfect, as we needed to get to the bus station quickly the day after. If we were to come back in Panama City, then we would most definitely book this bed & breakfast again!
reviews.title: You'll never meet more hospitable owners!

reviews.text: My family & I stayed here for a couple nights at the beginning of our trip to Panama.
reviews.title: Cozy rooms & wonderful owners

reviews.text: The room was very clean & cozy. The owners were also wonderful. They went out of their way to help us with our needs. The location is a bit far from the center of town but it didin't really matter to us since we were out sightseeing around town most of the day.
reviews.title: Greatness`

reviews.text: I chose this hotel based on the reviews and I was not disappointed. Only in Panama for one night, I figured I would try it. I arrived mid-afternoon and there was someone to pick me and my mom up from the airport. There was no waiting or searching and we promptly set out to Mediterranean Dreams. Upon our arrival we were greeted by Alejandro,the owner, and he made us feel right at home.My mom and I were stayed in the Lime room and it was exactly as it was pictured online. The beds were very comfortable and I had a great nights rest. Alejandro was very nice and so accomodating. Since I wasn't sure how the BnB would turn out, I only reserved a room for 1 night. After falling in love with the service, I wanted to book another night. Although Med. Dreams was unable to accomodate my request, Alejandro helped me find a safe affordable hotel. Something that he didn't have to do. I left my jacket and he arranged to have it delivered to the new hotel, where I was staying! Overall, I really enjoyed my stay at Med. Dreams and would go back in a heart beat.
reviews.title: A quaint home

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Being a quintessential traveler traversing the globe, i have grown to become quite picky in my requirements in services and hotel types, cancelling a reservation in a different hotel solely on the suggestion of my friend from the Swiss, i decided to try the Mediterranean dreams, to describe it in one word, its a oasis. The opening statement from Alejandro the owner of the hotel was "if you dont feel at home here, its better you go somewhere else". i was taken back but thought ok lemme see if his words is worth its weight. it indeed was.
reviews.title: Friendly, welcoming with personnel service

description: Mediterranean Dreams is a Bed and Breakfast located in the center of Panama, have seven bedrooms, two with shared facilities and five suites with private bathroom each one is a fruit. Breakfast is included in the price and have dinner an additional service based on Mediterranean diet.
